src.tests package¶

Module contents¶

This package contains the source for all unit tests of the app.

Subpackages¶

  • src.tests.resources package

Submodules¶

src.tests.test_build_classes module¶

Test the build classes utility module.

src.tests.test_build_classes.mock_db_connection(monkeypatch)[source]¶

Fixture to mock sqlite3.connect to use the test database.

Parameters:

monkeypatch – pytest feature to allow mocking of connect

src.tests.test_build_classes.reset_db(mock_db_connection)[source]¶

Reset the database before each test.

Parameters:

mock_db_connection – The mock connection

src.tests.test_build_classes.test_build_classes(mock_db_connection, reset_db)[source]¶

Test the build classes function.

Parameters:

  • mock_db_connection – The mock connection

  • reset_db – resets the database
